website_summaries.verdict: Using only the highest-quality ingredients, this charcoal bubble mask showcases superior formula with impressive results.
pros: Activated charcoal and clay formula offers supreme moisturizing to skin
Free of parabens, sulfates, and DEA
Organic ingredients have not been tested on animals
cons: Sensitive skin might experience  reactions to mask

customer_reviews.title: It was fun, but....eh.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product -and had plans to share and have fun with it over Thanksgiving with family. I tried it prior to my family arriving and wasn’t overly impressed with the actual results. It felt fun as it bubbled, but once removed I didn’t notice much of a difference with my skin or pores. My skin is sensitive and I was pleasantly surprised it didn’t burn, turn red, or cause break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gore

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my Skin within 1 minute
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my skin and within a minute my skin was burning so I rinsed it off and my entire face was beet red for an hour. I had to put Aloe Vera on my face and by the morning I was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful using this product. After the required ten minutes as I was removing the product I noticed that my skin was being removed as well. Had to get in the shower and let the water splash this product away. A week later I still have several places on my face that haven’t healed.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha L. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: the mask is good - value for money. provides blood flow. which leads to a decrease in expression wrinkles
customer_reviews.author: nastjazh99

customer_reviews.title: Great skincare product
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to use. My skin feels fantastic after using and it has helped clear up acne and blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Em stein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Face Mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my teenage daughter who has moderate acne. This mask really cleans her skin and acne leaving her face soft, smooth and a remarkable reduction with breakouts. Will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and tingles
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite charcoal mask. It just makes your skin feel clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles clean very good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stufff. So smooth and soft after use.
customer_reviews.author: Wagb-37

customer_reviews.title: Use faithfully snd you will see a cahnge in your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use it once a week and I am seeing a change in my skin. Plus I love the way it bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. LDK

customer_reviews.title: Makes me face feel clean and soft
customer_reviews.text: Love this product even though it makes my face really read for about an hour after use..
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: My skin was very refreshed, soft, and clean after using this cleanser/mask. Make sure to follow instructions, you can't rub it, easier to apply with a brush. Also, super fun to look like a cute storm cloud :-)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y

customer_reviews.title: Expected a bit more bubbling
customer_reviews.text: It didn't bubble as much as i was expecting, but it still works great as a mask. Left my skin feeling super soft
customer_reviews.author: Carie Blogan

customer_reviews.title: kind a disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it was open when i received. black stuff was everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: My face tends to be very dry. Every product I've ordered from Imagine Dermatology has improved my skins texture immensely . My latest purchase from them was the Bubbling Charcoal Mask. Once you put it on your face you can feel it bubbling, which is actually a cool feeling. Like with all their products it made my face feel so smooth and soft-not dry at all. I will definitely buy this product again. This is a GREAT company with wonderful products. Very affordable too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My Esthetician uses in my facial. When I got home I texted her and said let me know what that is I love how my skin feels. It really is a unique experience you didn't and my skin feels wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Sarhan

customer_reviews.title: bubblylicious
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a second mask on my acne facial clients- they love the fragrance and the bubble sensation, skin looks refreshed and calmed afterwards...grreat product ...thanQ
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Skin
customer_reviews.text: I've used it three times now, and have liked the results. The charcoal bubbles away and the result is very smooth skin. The container is well designed and works perfectly and easily. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the charcoal mask
customer_reviews.text: I love the charcoal mask. It is hard to explain the way it feels when it bubbles up on your skin but I leave it on for about 10 minutes and then I wash off with cool/warm water. Leaves my skin feeling really nice and is reasonable compared to other masks on the market.
customer_reviews.author: April Cisman

customer_reviews.title: This mask is awesome! It’s unlike any other facial mask I’ve used ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome! It’s unlike any other facial mask I’ve used before. When it starts to bubble, it tickles a little bit and feels like I have a bubble bath on my face. I must admit, I couldn’t stop giggling the first time I used it. My face feels really soft after giving it a charcoal bubble bath!
customer_reviews.author: Butte Strong

customer_reviews.title: Bubbling beauty!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mask! The day after using it, I got multiple compliments on my skin. The only con is that it's extremely messy. Still worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a one of my new favorite face masks! I had so much fun using it. I pumped a few times into one hand and use the other hand to apply to my skin. It applied as a thick consistency and slowly starts Bubbling up. It was such a funny feeling, feeling it bubble up on my skin. I feel light tingling and a cool sensation while it worked on my skin. I let it sit for ten minutes and removed it with warm water. It takes a little longer to remove than other masks but it's worth it. My skin and pores look cleaner. My skin look less oily and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia M.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin - no go
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. I have super sensitive skin on my face and I had a bad reaction to it. I am afraid to try more than the one time. It said moisturizing, but I felt it dried out my face. For someone who may have an oily and less sensitive skin this may be a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Buscaglia

customer_reviews.title: Ready to buy more already!
customer_reviews.text: We got this product today in the mail and my wife went right in and gave it a try and now she won't stop talking about it! She is amazed at how fresh her face feels. I can see the difference as well. Her skin feels and looks clean and fresh. Totally happy with this stuff. It was shipped fast, packaged well and my wife is already telling her friends about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody S

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: First try and every bit as good as I had hoped. Cleanses without drying. Feels a little strange at first - not used to using a mask - and this one tingles as it bubbles!!! I like it. Gentle on my sensitive skin. Left it on 10 minutes. Rinsed off easily. Patted dry and followed up with my regular morning routine of Imagine Smoother Skin anti aging renewal complex & Imagine Instant Lifting wrinkle fighter. I am very pleased with this mask and love Imagine Dermatology products...
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: It left my skin feeling super clean. The only thing that's a little annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed by this mask- I wasn't really sure what to expect, but it really does bubble up!! It left my skin feeling super clean. The only thing that's a little annoying is that it's pretty thick since it's a clay, but that's just the trade off with any clay mask out there. It just takes a little bit longer to remove; I usually use a clean washcloth to help.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Fun and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: This mask is not only fun to use, it works so well! My daughters are constantly stealing it. I love how fresh, clean and soft my skin feels after using this mask. I really appreciate the generous amount of product the company gives you in each container throughout their skincare line.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great company,  Great products
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes your skin feel awesome. Love the bubbling action. Another great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove with water
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves your skin shiny, tight feeling and glowing. The gray foam bubbles and tingles, so you can tell it is working. Easy to remove with water. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MGick

customer_reviews.title: This bubble face mask is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This bubble face mask is the best!!! I have very acne prone skin and it has been taking out all the bad toxins out of my skin!!! I recommend soo much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Baughman

customer_reviews.title: This Mask Really Oxygenates the Skin
customer_reviews.text: Indeed this mask, leaves you skin soft and smooth. The instructions state to apply a thick layer using 5-10 pumps. With my first two applications, I probably used 6-9 pumps and it was just too much product. Practically impossible to wash off. I used a clean white wash cloth to remove excess mask residue and it stained the towel grey. With subsequent applications, I used less and it was easier to remove. It really tingles so I go a little lighter with the application where there are broken capillaries. This delivers a powerful oxygenating effect.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseS

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal mask...fun too!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! Really gets into pores and cleans the gunk out! The only product that gets the stubborn blackheads on my nose out! Does not dry out my skin and all my later steps absorb into my skin better!
customer_reviews.author: Ayu_tenshi177

customer_reviews.title: I love love this face mask it makes your face so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love love this face mask it makes your face so soft cleans your face washes off with ease. Ladies this is a must buy product! I give it 5 stars .
customer_reviews.author: jeanne coulombe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! You can feel it really getting into ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! You can feel it really getting into your pores for a god deep clean. The bubble action is addictive!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Purifying and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This mask gives me the purifying benefits of clay and helps clear up blemishes while still leaving my skin feeling moisturized! Other clay masks dry out my skin, but not this one. The bubbles are SO fun too.
customer_reviews.author: Y in LG

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I love how bubbly but gentle it feels on my sensitive skin. It felt clean and refreshed afterward. I'll purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product! The foaming was excellent. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole G

customer_reviews.title: Does have a tingle to it but I like that as it feels like its working
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure what to expect as I have never used any type of "bubbling" face mask. Pleasantly surprised at how clean my face felt. Does have a tingle to it but I like that as it feels like its working. Another great product!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect, but this is a really great product! Like a little massage for your face, and it left skin nice and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bubbling Charcoal Clay Face Mask No DEA, No SLES, NO Parabens, Detoxifying, Oxygenating, Purifying, Moisturizing, Made From High End Ingredients (5.5 oz 165 g)
product_meta.description: Size:5.5 OunceBubbling Detoxifying Charcoal Face Mask (5.5 oz 165 g) This Mask provides intensive Detoxification, Hydration, to the skin while removing Excess Oil, and Blackheads. The mask dispensed from convenient pump, turns to a dense foam after application providing oxygen to the skin and invigorating sensorial experience. ===== Made with Organic Ingredients, this mask does not contain Parabens, DEA, Or SLES that is Found in the Cheap Competitors.===== This is a high end luxury product, brought to you at an affordable price. We stand behind our products quality, and if for any reason you are not satisfied, please contact us and we will make things right. ====== Ingredients: Organic Infusion of Rosehips :Lavender and Hibiscus, Glycerin, Kaolin, Cocamidapropyl Betaine, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Bentonite, Capric/ Caprylic Triglycerides, Sodium Methyl-2 Sulfolaurate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Decyl Glucoside, Methyl Perfluobutyl Ether, Methyl Perfluoroisobutyl Ether, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Cetyl Alcohol, Ethyl Perfluorobutyl Ether, Ethyl Perfluoroisobutyl Ether, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Activated Carbon, Titanium Dioxide, Phenoxyethanol, Niacinamide, Calcium Pantothenate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Maltodextrin, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Hyaluronic Acid, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Allantoin, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, PEG-150 Distearate, Sodium PCA, Urea, Trehalose, Polyquaternium-51, Triacetin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Capryl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate
feature_bullets: Smooth Creamy Texture, Transforms to a Dense Foam as it Delivers its Super Charged Oxygen to the Skin
WE USE HIGH END INGREDIENTS, NO DEA, NO SLES, NO PARABENS LIKE THE CHEAP KIDS STUFF IN THE JAR

Activated Charcoal, and Clays Purifies, Detoxifies, Hydrates the Skin while providing Essential Minerals. Scientifically Designed Proprietary Complex of Moisturizers, Nutrients, Herbs and Extracts to Help Promote Skin Health
Made with Organic Ingredients, No Parabens, No Animal Testing, No Artificial Colors or Fragrances, No Phthalates, No Sulfates, Made in the USA
No Risk, return unused portion within 60 days for your money back
